user.title: Set up Ambient Sounds
user.description: Enter your Freesound API key to search and play ambient sounds. Get your free API key at https://freesound.org/apiv2/apply/

error.invalid_api_key:
Invalid API key or connection failed. Please verify:
1. Your API key is correct (get it at https://freesound.org/apiv2/apply/)
2. You have an active internet connection
3. The API key has been activated
